channel.description: Recent content in startup on Sal Prima

item.title: Leading in Crisis by Handry Satriago - CEO GE Indonesia (ID)
item.description: Situasi dunia di tengah serbuan Virus Corona dan dampak ekonominya (sekarang dan nanti), membuat saya teringat berbagai pengalaman saya dan pelajaran dari orang-orang lain yang mengajarkan saya tentang bagaimana leader menghadapi krisis.

item.title: My Startup Failed by Thomas Schulz (ID)
item.description: Sebuah cerita tentang kebahagiaan, kesedihan, kemajuan, kemunduran serta semua hal yang ada di antaranya ‚ù§Ô∏èüíî

item.title: [Video] Microservice Architecture With Java (Public Speaking at TIA PDC'18)
item.description: Tech in Asia Product Development Conference 2018 is a unique two days conference which brings together developer community, thought leaders and successful practitioners of product development.
